::Windlord/Nightlight/Termitron::

The three bots were flewing in nocturnal landscape.

"Where's Aerotaur" asked Nighlight

"By all the hawks!!!!" said Windlord "I've thought that he was 
behind.. low the speed... "and used his com link " Aerotaur... do you 
copy???"

"Termitron could you go to find him ?" asked Nighlight.

"In this instant" and the bug flew to find aerotaur

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He watches them leave.  As soon as he realizes that they're 
leaving He 
> shouts "Hey any one want...a ...lift."  By the time he finishes he 
knows 
> they're out of range.  He turns back and hauls the CR chamber out 
of the 
> ship.  He keeps a record of their course on his sensors.  He takes 
off 
> carrying the CR chamber in his massive feet.  He manages to catch 
up slowly.
